// Discrete distribution for choosing 4 events from 4 categories.
// Category probabilities are 1/10, 1/5, 3/10, and 2/5
// In order to create a one-dimensional distribution, outcomes are coded base 5 (4+1):
// E.g., [ 3, 0, 1, 0 ] => 28, [ 1, 2, 0, 1 ] => 136
